overview:
Yael Reznik Cramer is responsible for BRMâ€™s financial operations, financial reporting, taxation, information systems and administration.

Prior to joining BRM, Yael was CFO of STAR Ventures in Israel for over 9 years. She played an active and significant role as CFO in the exit procedures of more than 50 companies within STARâ€™s suite of portfolio companies. Before joining STAR, Yael was Controller at Lannet Data Communications Ltd. (NASDAQ: LANTF) and an Audit Team Manager at Bavli Milner, one of Israel’s leading accounting firms.

Yael is a Certified Public Accountant in Israel and holds a B.A degree in Accounting and Economics from the Hebrew University in Jerusalem and an MBA from Tel-Aviv University.

via: BRM Capital
